snippet.title: 10 Mississippi  - A stop motion game about a daily routine!
snippet.description:
Play for free on itch.io https://knarniapop.itch.io/10-mississippi?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt 10 Mississippi is a stop motion game about a day’s routine, played over and over and over and over again. 10 Mississippi plays with the taboo of film envy in games while  browsing through life’s interstitial moments - perusing through the fridge or waiting during the morning commute or composing an email to an old friend. 10 Mississippi is a game of uncomfortable, creeping intimacy.

➡️ More from Karina Popp https://knarniapop.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More experimental games https://itch.io/games/tag-experimental?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
